name: Presence
description: Helps control the rendering and unmounting of your content based on a given state.
description_zh: 根据给定的状态帮助控制内容的渲染和卸载。

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

immediate.description: Whether to synchronize the present change immediately or defer it to the next frame
immediate.description_zh: 是否立即同步 present 变化，还是推迟到下一帧

present.description: Whether the node is present (controlled by the user)
present.description_zh: 节点是否存在（由用户控制）

events.name: exitComplete
events.description: Function called when the animation ends in the closed state
events.description_zh: 在关闭状态下动画结束时调用的函数
